mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Anne H. Smith
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Anne H. Smith C. M. Stigleman, Guardian B. P. Elliott, Clerk of Floyd County Court, Assigned as guardian ad Litem for Carrie H. Smith Estate of Henry T. Stump J. T. Jett, Administrator W. H. Morgan, Commissioner of Accounts who framed the administration of the estate of Henry T. Stump B. P. Elliott, Clerk of Floyd County Court, Assigned Guardian ad Litem for Carrie H. Smith in the matter of C. M. Stigleman vs. Carrie H. Smith. Recorded in Ledger Book 2, page 190, in Floyd County Courthouse
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
